scripts.semver: docker-compose exec node-service npm --no-git-tag-version version patch
scripts.warning:
docker-compose exec node-service echo "WARNING: YOU'RE CRAZY!

"
scripts.beer:
docker-compose exec node-service echo "Grab a beer, this is going to take minute...

"
scripts.simplify:zip: docker-compose exec gdal-service bash ./scripts/simplify.sh zip kml
scripts.simplify:county: docker-compose exec gdal-service bash ./scripts/simplify.sh county kml
scripts.simplify:dma: docker-compose exec gdal-service bash ./scripts/simplify.sh dma json
scripts.simplify:city: docker-compose exec gdal-service bash ./scripts/simplify.sh city kml
scripts.neighborhood: npm run shp:neighborhood && npm run process:neighborhood && npm run simplify:neighborhood
scripts.dma: npm run topo:dma && npm run features:dma && npm run simplify:dma
scripts.city: npm run process:city && npm run simplify:city
scripts.zip: npm run process:zip && npm run simplify:zip
scripts.county: npm run process:county && npm run simplify:county
scripts.all: npm run warning && npm run neighborhood && npm run dma && npm run city && npm run zip && npm run county && npm run semver && npm run pack
scripts.all:complex: npm run shp:neighborhood && npm run process:neighborhood && npm run topo:dma && npm run features:dma && npm run process:city && npm run process:zip && npm run process:county
scripts.all:simplify: npm run beer && npm run simplify:neighborhood && npm run simplify:dma && npm run simplify:city && npm run simplify:zip && npm run simplify:county
